attributes.action: Make Arsenal FC The only club in North London and to relocate Tottenham FC to a mud pit in Yorkshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It goes without saying that some football clubs deserve more, in Tottenhams case and the false calls of them being a top four club, a Champions League side or even a side that plays quality football that they should be moved well out of London and stop embarissing the capital of our fine country with there rubbish football.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
